trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.PropertyValueUIItem.InvokeHandler*> event of a <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.PropertyValueUIItem"></xref>.

Double-clicking an icon in the Properties window will raise the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.PropertyValueUIItem.InvokeHandler%2A> event of the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.PropertyValueUIItem> that the icon is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 双击属性窗口中的图标将引发<xref:System.Drawing.Design.PropertyValueUIItem.InvokeHandler%2A>事件<xref:System.Drawing.Design.PropertyValueUIItem>，与关联的图标。</xref:System.Drawing.Design.PropertyValueUIItem> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.PropertyValueUIItem.InvokeHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.PropertyValueUIItem.InvokeHandler%2A> event typically launches a user interface (UI) to edit the property's value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Design.PropertyValueUIItem.InvokeHandler%2A>事件通常启动一个用户界面 (UI) 来编辑该属性的值。</xref:System.Drawing.Design.PropertyValueUIItem.InvokeHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: Add a PropertyValueUIItemInvokeHandler to the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.PropertyValueUIItem.InvokeHandler%2A> property of a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.PropertyValueUIItem> to assign an event handler to perform the appropriate behavior when the icon displayed next to the property name is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: 添加到 PropertyValueUIItemInvokeHandler<xref:System.Drawing.Design.PropertyValueUIItem.InvokeHandler%2A>属性<xref:System.Drawing.Design.PropertyValueUIItem>分配事件处理程序双击显示在属性名称旁边的图标时执行的适当行为。</xref:System.Drawing.Design.PropertyValueUIItem> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.PropertyValueUIItem.InvokeHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create a PropertyValueUIItemInvokeHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 当创建 PropertyValueUIItemInvokeHandler 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，添加到事件的委托的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，称为每当发生该事件时，事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。
